thread.title: [Video] Non-Depository Trust Companies: A View from the States
thread.title_full: [Video] Non-Depository Trust Companies: A View from the States

author: Pepper Hamilton LLP
title: [Video] Non-Depository Trust Companies: A View from the States
text:
Contact 
To embed, copy and paste the code into your website or blog: <iframe src="http://www.jdsupra.com/post/contentViewerEmbed.aspx?fid=8cc1cbb2-3a11-403c-aaa9-b7dbe94194a9" width="100%" height="620" frameborder="1" style="border: 2px solid #ccc; overflow-x:hidden !important; overflow:hidden;" scrolling="auto"></iframe> Pepper partner Timothy McTaggart along with state law and policy expert, John Prendergast from the Conference of State Bank Supervisors spoke for a one-hour webinar, covering the following topics:
•Quick recap of FDIC/OCC requirement for FDIC insurance and the impact on state-chartered non-depository trust companies 
•State supervision trends and challenges for state-chartered non-depository trust See more + Pepper partner Timothy McTaggart along with state law and policy expert, John Prendergast from the Conference of State Bank Supervisors spoke for a one-hour webinar, covering the following topics:
•Quick recap of FDIC/OCC requirement for FDIC insurance and the impact on state-chartered non-depository trust companies 
•State supervision trends and challenges for state-chartered non-depository trust companies 
•Efforts by state policy makers to maintain charter flexibility and modernization in the trust area 
•Other charter/supervisory issues for practitioners. 
See less -
